posts.post_content:
It appears that Mullin has pine tar on the wrong end of his bat.  Nevertheless the card was graded VG 3 by the folks at PSA.
The reverse is Sweet Caporal 350 subjects with the Factory 30 designation.
Asking $45 shipped.  (PP F&F preferred)  If you want to pay more for this card, forget it.
PS : The card is well centered front and back.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10482/mullin-batting[/IMG]

Shipping is included in the asking price.
